name: fileorganizer
description: File organizer plugin (using porn-vault's library data). It uses your custom-defined templates to rename your scene files.

arguments.name: dry
arguments.description: Whether to perform the rename operation or just a simulation.

arguments.name: fileStructureTemplate
arguments.description: The template for the new name. See documentation above for details.

arguments.name: normalizeAccents
arguments.description: Whether to normalize file names and path to unaccented unicode.

arguments.name: normalizeMultipleSpaces
arguments.description: Whether to replace multiple spaces with a single space.

arguments.name: nameConflictHandling
arguments.description: Behavior in case of name conflicts. Possible values are: `rename`, `overwrite` and `skip`. With 'rename', the new filename is suffixed with a number so that it does not conflict with an existing name anymore. With 'overwrite', the existing file is overriden by the renamed one. For 'skip', the rename operation is cancelled.

arguments.name: dateFormat
arguments.description: The date format to use in file names.

arguments.name: multiValuesSeparator
arguments.description: The separator to use for multiple values (like actors, labels,...). For instance, with a `,` as separator, the list of labels will be: `label1, label2, label3`.

arguments.name: characterReplacement
arguments.description: Used to substitite characters with a replacement alternative. See doc above for details.
